bioconda.name: bioconductor-summarizedexperiment
bioconda.summary: A container (S4 class) for matrix-like assays

biotools.summary: This software contains one or more assays, each represented by a matrix-like object of numeric or other mode. The rows typically represent genomic ranges of interest and the columns represent samples.

bioschemas.name: SummarizedExperiment
bioschemas.summary: This software contains one or more assays, each represented by a matrix-like object of numeric or other mode. The rows typically represent genomic ranges of interest and the columns represent samples.
